Posts.Content: Jan 7, 2009 05:54PM monica4825 wrote: Hello Maria, I will be starting my radiation Jan 19 so I can't tell you what to expect, but will be learning along with you.  I understand for those of us who may experience the fatigue, it will hit about the third week.  I am very impressed that you are continuing to go to nursing school. I am a registered nurse, and have found it to be a great occupation with a lot of varying opportunities.  Monica
Posts.Title: side effects of radiation therapy Maria217 Imasurvivor
